website_summaries.verdict: This attractive wooden organizer is a wonderful match for those wanting a functional, fashionable model.
pros: Includes 3 drawers for writing utensils and miscellaneous supplies
2 side compartments offer space for filing papers, books, and journals
5 open bins on top for easy access
cons: Smaller than some buyers would have liked
A few owners claimed the product arrived slightly damaged

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something small enough to fit on my family room side table to organize the clutter. I love this. The deeper drawer is big enough to hold my iReliev TENS/EMS device and my small eyeglass cleaner bottle. The two smaller drawers are great for nail files, clippers, etc. The mail slot holders on both sides are great for holding notepads and the electrode pads for my TENS/EMS unit. It's sturdy and nice looking, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Small but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice small desktop organizer. Drawers do not have a stop to prevent them from being pulled out all the way but this is a minor quibble. Construction appears to be some sort of hardboard or particle board with cherry-colored vinyl applied to all surfaces. OK for this application and price. Smart phone and Kindle fit in compartments. Rubber feet are a plus. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy and Nicely Priced
customer_reviews.text: I have an L-shaped computer desk with a wood-backed shelf on one side. The area under the shelf is a bit of wasted space so I bought one of these organizers to fill it in a bit and add more utility. I loved it so much I bought two more of the same wood finish but different arrangement styles to fill out the entire space under the shelf. They turned that section into the look of one of those old desks with all those little cubbyholes and different-sized drawers. Great look and utility!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, well made and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive organizer. I already had one and kept finding more uses for it so had to get another. Make sure you pay attention to the dimensions given, some think it is larger than it is. If you take out a drawer it works perfect for a remote control garage and I found uses for the the drawers I took out. They look very nice on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Derby City David

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged item.
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because the item is really nice and appears good quality, but it arrived damaged and it isn't worth the trouble of going to the ups store to send it back to Amazon. Otherwise I'm pretty satisfied with the item, and I'll probably use it anyway, but I wouldn't have spent the money if I knew it would be damaged already when I received it. If you're thinking of buying this item, I'd say make sure you look thoroughly before tearing all the packaging apart. It does appear high quality and the drawers slide nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kristjen

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to be cheaply made because of the price; however, I was pleasantly surprised at its durability. It matches the top of my desk perfectly and looks like it was meant to go with it as a set. I like how there is one long drawer that I can fit a couple pens inside. The top drawer and deep drawer I've been using to store smaller items like erasers, whiteout, and flashcards. The sides are great for storing mail. Overall, I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: 3 Wooden Kanobs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice organizer, as I searched throughout Amazon for all the options I found this gem. Never before in my life have I encountered such beautiful wooden Kanobs. The Kanobs are so delicate and magical, yet they are sturdy. These are the Kanobs you are looking for. I know that these Kanobs will give me years of pleasure. The Rubber Ani-Slip pads are just the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for may needs
customer_reviews.text: I hoped to buy some sort of unit to hold a variety of small items that I needed to have on my desk, close at hand. This handsomely designed desk organizer is perfect! It sits on top of my audio tuner, looks really good and holds all of my items. One of the best purchases I've made in years. I enjoy it every day!
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This wooden desk organizer is just perfect on my counter by the telephone. Drawers and slots for keys, pens, paper, and everything one might need near a phone. It isn't overly large, so it doesn't take up a lot of counter space. Just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Doris M.

customer_reviews.title: Looked good and we wanted to keep it but not broken
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when it arrived. Looked good and we wanted to keep it but not broken. Sent it back and there were no more.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Attractive desktop organizer and convenient. Great of keeping a few things organized. Pens, work access key card, a few key file folders, check book, etc. Pay close attention to the dimensions as the photograph makes the object look larger than it actually is. Isn’t an issue for me, but don’t think your going to keep a large amount of things in this organizer; that being said, works great for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: PB Cannon

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I know what the measurements said but it's not that usable for me. If it was just a tiny bit larger it would be great. It's attractive though. It does hold paperclips, smaller sticky notes, pens, and planner, mail, etc. I'm NOT sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Cherry Brown Office Wooden Desk Organizer
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I expected...small enough to fit nicely on my desk and large enough to hold office supplies and things I use daily for my business. Beautifully constructed and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great deal to keep you organized!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my bills upstairs instead of going to my downstairs office-this fit the bill. Solid, attractive, and well built for the money. Fast service!
customer_reviews.author: Holly T.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice organizer, came pre assembled and in perfect condition. It is very sturdy and the drawers slide in and out easily, I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to organize a desk or a nightstand. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hindman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This will work perfectly for my husbands side table. He accumulates lots of pens, pencils, toothpicks, post-its, notebooks, change, etc., etc., etc. Because it is a Holiday gift it hasn't been put to use yet but I am sure it will corral all of his things in a convenient, spacious and much more organized way. Thanks for a nice piece and quick shipping. I can't wait to give it to him to make it easier to find the things he "collects".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's nightstand. It looks great and is suitable for his needs. It is a little smaller that I thought but this is a minor thing especially since it is on a small surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect and not too bulky for a desk
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and not too bulky for a desk. The drawers are perfect size for pens and the top compartments are perfect for small things that you constantly need to grab. Holds my TV remotes as well. They have many different styles so you can pick which one will suit your needs the best. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer. Wish it had 2 pen cups instead of one pen cup and one only half as deep
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Small organizer
customer_reviews.text: The drawers are not large enough for discs and the ad said that they would hold discs.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing this product and it is a nice wooden desk organizer. It holds everything that I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that there weren't two full height slots on the left side. Only the back one is, the one in front of it is about an inch deep. However, it's still a great product, especially for the price! So I still am giving it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, little product. I have very little room to play with on my student desktop, and this little organizer is just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Shallenberger

customer_reviews.title: very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: just perfect for dresser top organizer. Keeps small items in drawers and wallet on top!
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I like the solidness and color of the product. It does not look cheap. So nice I purchased 2 more pieces to complete my office. Recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nisie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like it.... No complaints. I truly love the color and construction of it....
customer_reviews.author: Sedric Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice little organizer. Feels strudy, looks clean, and is functional. Put it on the kitchen counter. Keys, random items, and letters all have a home now.
customer_reviews.author: Bg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it , I needed one a little bigger but can’t get rid of this one .
customer_reviews.author: Nanara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for a desk with no drawers
customer_reviews.text: My new desk at work, although modern looking, has no drawers!! I purchased this for the usual desk items such as pens, highlighters, post-its. It even has several drawers that are perfect for paper clips and rubber bands. I have zero complaints and even bought one for others in my office who are in a similar situation. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Do however wish the file holders were in the back.
customer_reviews.author: ICHELL

customer_reviews.title: a spot for all the little items - And Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boss. It helped clean up his desk, a spot for all the little items - And Looks Great!
customer_reviews.author: SterlingGirl10

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice compartment for the little things in the office. Very well built. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Great office desk organiser
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is great I really like it and I would buy it again! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Strollo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Description
customer_reviews.text: The description leads you to believe that it is real wood. It is cheap particle board. Cheaply put together. Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Balsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Good looking organizer
customer_reviews.text: The organizer looks great, it is not cheap looking or flimsy. I didn't have any flaws on the one I received so I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk accessory
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my desk, and it matched perfectly. Well made and attractive as well as functional. Great find, and inexpensive for the quality and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Looks and quality .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and very well constructed . However , much smaller than I expected . I looked for something bigger like it and found none . To my disappointment , I had to settle for a metal one made by someone else .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is nicely built, looks nice, and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: MH Rider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Perfect for small spaces. Extremely attractive. Lots of storage room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and perfectly finished. Absolutely Great! Better than I even imagined and priced so reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Calverley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Portable Size - Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect! I was looking for something that wasn't too big that I could move from the Kitchen table to my office and that looked nice. I have recommended it to my friends who like to be organized. Thank you for a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: LRubin

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. It's sturdy, has plenty of space & it looks great. It is very functional. It is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality exactly as described. Delivered promptly. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Taggart

customer_reviews.title: The desk organizer itself is very nice and functional however it was shipped in its original ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk organizer itself is very nice and functional however it was shipped in its original “off the shelf” box (very thin and flimsy), not in a shipping package or box. Luckily it was not damaged despite the box being crumpled and torn.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth H Beall

customer_reviews.title: Compact organizer
customer_reviews.text: The desk organizer is a great size to put on our kitchen counter. Love that it has drawers, places for business cards and a place for folded 8x11 papers
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Flum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk organizer. It has just the right amount of drawers/compartments. Looks great on my desk and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Ditullio

customer_reviews.title: This desk organizer is awesome! A lot of space in the drawers
customer_reviews.text: This desk organizer is awesome! A lot of space in the drawers.....and many compartments to keep desk items. The wood finish really adds elegance to your desk
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! It's real wood! I bought 2 and gave one to a coworker. Fast shipping and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this product !! Love everything about this product, size, color !!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and love the 2 file sections on either side. Nice assortment and arrangement of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The drawers are so cute. Well made. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lela Bell

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to put together and sturdy. It is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. It is an exact fit for my demand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kabris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect desk organizer and just what I needed to keep everything in order.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great little office helper
customer_reviews.text: Great little office helper!! I love it, I wish it was a bit bigger but it works and looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: Put together well. Wish it was a tad bigger though

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was very cute on my desk, keeping it neat and clea. looking.. also arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Golda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute desk organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer fits perfectly on my kitchen counter and has helped me eliminate a lot of clutter.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, and looks and feels well made

customer_reviews.title: fits great on my work
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was expecting when I ordered it... fits great on my work desk
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice little organizer
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little organizer, but it arrived damaged in the front left base corner. So I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Exactly what I wanted. Arrived quickly and this company’s customer service is great. Thanx!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Executive Office Solutions Wooden Desk Organizer with 3 Drawers and Multiple Shelves/Racks for Office Supplies and Desk Accessories - Cherry/Black (EOS-WO4)
product_meta.description:
ORGANIZE YOUR DESK, ORGANIZE YOUR LIFE! 

The perfect office supply caddy! The sleek looking black mesh design will look great on your desk and hold all of your desktop accessories.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL LOOKING ORGANIZER – Sleek Looking Cherry Wood Gives This Desk Caddy Some Great Appeal, While The Black Edges Make For a Very Nice Contrast. Keep Your Office or Home Looking Professional and Organized With This Affordable Desktop Organizer!

PLENTY OF STORAGE – With a Total of 3 Drawers, 3 Flat Surface Compartments, 2 Vertical Compartments, and a Double Side Book or CD/DVD Rack, This Workspace Organizer Can Hold All of Your Essentials. Total Dimensions Are 11.7” Wide by 7.7” Deep by 5.6” Tall, Making It Large Enough To Hold All Your Desk Accessories, But Small Enough That It Doesn’t Take Up a Ton Of Desktop or Counter Space.

IDEAL FOR HOME OR OFFICE – Whether You Need To Tidy Things Up at Your Work Office, Home Office, or Kitchen, This Supply Caddy Will Do The Trick. The Ample Storage Makes It Ideal For Post It Note, Binder Clips, Paper Clips, Scissors, Markers/Highlighters/Pens/Pencils, Tape, Erasers, White Out, And a Myriad Of Other Office Essentials. The Side Rack Also Is Also a Great Place to Put Mail!
ANTI-SLIP BOTTOM – Rubber Adhesive Pads Keep The Desk Organizer From Sliding Around On Your Desk, While Also Providing a Soft Barrier So That Your Desk Top or Countertop Will Not Be Scratched.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
